reviews.review_msg: Very dedicated, and genuinely cares about student's. If you are not willing to work extremely hard forget about any decent grade. Extremely difficult marker, and is not overly clear in seminars

Really Great!  Very sweet woman, and she really makes the classroom an inclusive place.  Discussion is welcome and lively.  She is a difficult marker, but if you put in the work, you will get a pretty decent grade

Andrea's a good prof with a passion for what she teaches. She sees to love her students. She does play favourites, so get in early (it WILL effect your mark). I would take a class of hers again for sure.
this guy was a good prof, but he expects too much from his 400 level students. I took his 485: Cold War and busted my ass. Ended up with a B.This guy's a freak. who got an A in his class?

Willeen is a great prof altho she tries to scare you off the 1st day. She's very smart, helpful, and easy to talk to. Her assignments are clear & straightforward, not too hard but not too easy either. She was very passionate about this topic (NFLD) since that's where she's from originally. Overall, I recommend her. Nice person, interesting class.
Super nice, good marker, very interested and knowledgeable about subject. Doesn't always give super clear instructions but very willing to go over things you don't understand.
Class was always interesting and went by quick.  Fair marker.  She was fun and made students feel like she was on the same level as them.  Really cool teacher.

Wonderful prof. Readings are manageable compared to other 400 level courses. Extremely nice and accommodating. If you're looking to dive into a 400 level course within the History department look no further.

Clossey is a downright wonderful human being.  He will help out anyone who asks and seems to really care about his students.  Be prepared to work hard in his classes (lots of reading!).  He is definitely not an easy marker, but it is worth the effort!  I would take any class he was teaching because he manages to make them fun and interesting!
